meta.description: Free and Open On-Chip Debugging, In-System Programming and Boundary-Scan Testing

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 or later

meta.long_description:
OpenOCD provides on-chip programming and debugging support with a layered
architecture of JTAG interface and TAP support, debug target support
(e.g. ARM, MIPS), and flash chip drivers (e.g. CFI, NAND, etc.).  Several
network interfaces are available for interactiving with OpenOCD: HTTP,
telnet, TCL, and GDB.  The GDB server enables OpenOCD to function as a
"remote target" for source-level debugging of embedded systems using the
GNU GDB program.
meta.name: openocd

        OpenOCD to function as a "remote target" for source-level debugging
        of embedded systems using the GNU GDB program.
